modmenu.descriptionTranslation.viafabric: Minecraft Fabric mod which allows you to join EVERY Minecraft server version (Classic, Alpha, Beta, Release, April Fools, Bedrock)
base.viafabricplus.something_went_wrong: Something went wrong! Please try again later
base.viafabricplus.name: Name
general_settings.viafabricplus.extra_inf: Show extra information in Debug HUD
general_settings.viafabricplus.show_clas: Show classic loading progress in connect screen
general_settings.viafabricplus.filter_cr: Remove unavailable items from creative tab
general_settings.viafabricplus.load_skin: Load skins and skulls in legacy versions
general_settings.viafabricplus.emulate_i: Emulate inventory actions in alpha versions
general_settings.viafabricplus.save_scro: Save scroll position in slot screens
bedrock_settings.viafabricplus.click_to_: Click to set account for Bedrock Edition
bedrock_settings.viafabricplus.replace_d: Replace default port in server list
debug_settings.viafabricplus.dont_create: Don't create packet error crash reports
debug_settings.viafabricplus.hide_modern: Hide modern command block screen features
authentication_settings.viafabricplus.ve: Verify session for online mode servers
authentication_settings.viafabricplus.au: Automatically select CPE when using the ClassiCube server list
authentication_settings.viafabricplus.se: Set session name to ClassiCube name when using the ClassiCube server list
visual_settings.viafabricplus.hide_downl: Hide download terrain screen transition effects
visual_settings.viafabricplus.replace_pe: Replace petrified oak slab texture with the 'unknown' texture
visual_settings.viafabricplus.replace_hu: Replace hurt sound with OOF sound
visual_settings.viafabricplus.force_unic: Force Unicode font for non-ASCII languages
visual_settings.viafabricplus.lock_block: Lock third-person arm rotation whilst blocking
force_version.viafabricplus.title: Please select the version with which the server should be pinged/connected
click_to_set_bedrock_account.viafabricpl:
Your browser should have opened.
Closing this screen will cancel the process!
change_game_menu_screen_layout.viafabric: Adjusts button positions and overlays based on the selected version.
Replaces "Player Reporting" with "Social Interactions" screen in <= 1.18.2.
Does not modify the game menu screen at all.
report.viafabricplus.create_via_dump.fai: Failed to create a dump! See logs for more information.
report.viafabricplus.create_via_dump.suc: Dump created and copied to clipboard!
classicube.viafabricplus.account: You can create an account here: https://www.classicube.net/
classicube.viafabricplus.loading: Loading profile information and server list...
classicube.viafabricplus.warning: This feature will send API requests to the ClassiCube API.
betacraft.viafabricplus.failed_to_verify: ViaFabricPlus couldn't verify your session! Please log in to an account or disable the BetaCraft authentication in the ViaFabricPlus Settings
betacraft.viafabricplus.warning: Pressing this button will send API requests to "betacraft.uk/serverlist".
translation.viafabricplus.packet_error: An error occurred while translating a packet! See more details in the logs!
classic4j_library.viafabricplus.error.to: Incorrect token. Is your ViaFabricPlus out of date?
classic4j_library.viafabricplus.error.ve: User hasn't verified their email address yet.
classic4j_library.viafabricplus.error.lo: Multi-factor authentication requested. Please check your email.
minecraftauth_library.viafabricplus.xbls: Authenticating with Xbox Live using SISU...
bedrock_realms.viafabricplus.warning: This feature requires a Bedrock Edition account to be set in the settings!
bedrock_realms.viafabricplus.unavailable: Your ViaFabricPlus is outdated and not compatible with Minecraft Realms.
bedrock_realms.viafabricplus.error: An error occurred, see the logs for more information
bedrock_realms.viafabricplus.incompatibl: The Realms Minecraft version is either too old or too new
